metadata.Title: CVE-2021-22176 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting all versions starting with 3.0.1. Improper access control allows demoted project members to access details on authored merge requests

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
